revision.revremark: First version for Doehler und Haass, where most decoders share the same CVs. Even function decoders need motor settings for the (optional) SUSI sound modules. A few exceptions are made ('include' or 'exclude'). There are a few firmware versions for each model, a few advanced functions *might* not be supported by old firmwares, and some functions (such as RailCom feedback) may not work on old models even with recent firmware. This file contains VARIABLES ONLY; for the decoders definitions see: Doehler_Haass_*.xml files in the root decoder folder.

variable.label: Function for front and rear lights on
Fonction pour feux avant et arrière
Funktion für LV und LR ein
Function for AUX 1 and AUX 2 on
Fonction pour allumer AUX 1 et AUX 2
Funktion für AUX 1 und AUX 2 ein
Consist Address Active For FL in Forward
Consist Address Active For FL in Forward
Consist Address Active For FL in Reverse
Consist Address Active For FL in Reverse
